name: Jet Stream
description:
Susano throws forward a gust of air which creates a whirlwind, dealing damage every .75s for 3s.
He may activate this ability again to teleport to the whirlwind.
If the initial gust hits an Enemy, the whirlwind surrounds and travels with them, and teleporting to the Enemy reduces this cooldown to 10s.
stats: Damage Per Tick: 20/30/40/50/60 (+25% of your physical power)
